extDescription.message: Extract video subtitles from Bilibili and YouTube for AI assistants like Claude that support page content reading

dataStoredHint.message: Data is stored in the $element$ element
dataStoredHint.description: Hint about where data is stored

noSubtitles.message: No subtitles available for this video

errorNotVideoPage.message: Please open a Bilibili or YouTube video page to use this extension
errorNotVideoPage.description: Error when not on video page

errorCannotCommunicate.message: Cannot communicate with page, please refresh and try again
errorCannotCommunicate.description: Error when cannot communicate with content script

errorNotLoaded.message: Extension not loaded, please refresh the page (Ctrl+R / Cmd+R)
errorNotLoaded.description: Error when content script not loaded

errorCannotDetect.message: Cannot detect video info, please refresh and try again

enableSubtitlesHint.message: Please enable subtitles and play the video, subtitles will be captured automatically
enableSubtitlesHint.description: Hint to enable subtitles on YouTube

errorRefreshFailed.message: Refresh failed, please reload the page
